document_data.name: Akri
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Akri''' was a tribe of [[werecat]]s living in the [[Anauroch]] desert.

The tribe was lead by a male named [[Los]] until after the [[Time of Troubles]] of [[1358 DR]]. Afterwards it was led by a female named [[Karse (werecat)|Karse]].{{Cite comic/Temptations|72}}
